net.bedra.maciej.springfx

Class FXMLProvider

  • Object
    • FXMLProvider

  • public class FXMLProvider
extends Object
    Set of tools for FXML views handling.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FXMLProvider(AnnotationConfigApplicationContext applicationContext)
      FXMLProvider constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addView(String name, String path)
      Add FXML view to provider collection with accessible name.
      URL getView(String name)
      Get FXML view from provider collection for accessible name.
      Object loadScene(String name)
      Change whole scene by loading FXML view directly in JavaFX primary stage.
      FXMLView loadView(String name)
      Load FXML view to an object that wraps any JavaFX component that can be used as placeholder and it's controller.
      void setLanguagePack(ResourceBundle bundle)
      Set language pack for FXML provider to transfer it later to other components.
      void setPrimaryStage(Stage stage)
      Set primary stage for FXML provider to use it later for loading FXML content.

      • getView

        public URL getView(String name)
        Get FXML view from provider collection for accessible name.
        Parameters:
        name - accessible FXML view name
        Returns:
        URL FXML view location

      • loadScene

        public Object loadScene(String name)
        Change whole scene by loading FXML view directly in JavaFX primary stage.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the FXML view to load
        Returns:
        Object controller for loaded FXML view

      • loadView

        public FXMLView loadView(String name)
        Load FXML view to an object that wraps any JavaFX component that can be used as placeholder and it's controller.
        Parameters:
        name - accessible name of the FXML view to load
        Returns:
        FXMLView FXML view wrapper that contains component with loaded view and it's controller

      • addView

        public void addView(String name,
                    String path)
        Add FXML view to provider collection with accessible name.
        Parameters:
        name - accessible name for FXML view
        path - path to FXML view file

      • setLanguagePack

        public void setLanguagePack(ResourceBundle bundle)
        Set language pack for FXML provider to transfer it later to other components.
        Parameters:
        bundle - language pack bundle

      • setPrimaryStage

        public void setPrimaryStage(Stage stage)
        Set primary stage for FXML provider to use it later for loading FXML content.
        Parameters:
        stage - Java FX primary application stage
